text: Blue belt may refer to: *The Blue Belt, a Norwegian fairy tale *Blue Belt (Pittsburgh), the Allegheny County road belt system *Blue belt, a rank in martial arts (see Black belt) **Blue belt (Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu), a level in the Brazilian jiu-jitsu ranking system *Staten Island Bluebelt, a storm water management system ==See also== * Blue Line (disambiguation) * Blue Route (disambiguation)
title: Blue belt
